about_the_game:
Liquidum - Secrets of the Deep is a DLC for Liquidum with 3 level packs including 26 new levels and introducing a new mechanic: hints inside cells. These hints tell you how many waters are present around the cell, and unlock many new strategies and even more complex and enjoyable levels.

Each of the DLC's level packs contain its own endless procedurally generated levels, which you unlock after completing all hand-crafted levels.

Purchasing this DLC is a way to support us to continue working on Liquidum!
